title: Bug 37479BIDI: Dropdown list of CCombo doesn't inherit it's orientation from CCombo.
description: Bug 37479BIDI: Dropdown list of CCombo doesn't inherit it's orientation from CCombo. Therefore it inherit it's orientation not from CCombo, but fromit's parent shell.
OB: Shell, which stores dropdown list of CCombo, is always created with NOTRIMstyle only.
